Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Model of a vase
Description: Model of a tubular vase without a neck but with a slightly bulging body and with a small flat circular base. Forty-seven examples of this type were found in the same deposit. See E27 032, 27 033, 27 034, 27 035, 27 036, 27 037.
